title: Silver 3, previously gold ADC looking for support
body: I only recently started playing again after hardly playing since season 4 (So I obviously got placed quite low) I am an adc main as of current (draven in particular) and if you look at my past matches you will see I generally have a high kd and play very well, am looking for a support main who plays aggressive supports such as thresh, alistar, leona, morgana etc. I havent played much this season and am looking to climb to gold relatively quickly. Thanks

replies.body:
support main, rolling hardcore brand supp
have usually carried as my past matches will show. 
Can play tanky things like leo and thresh though. 

Catch is, games will end up 2v8. 
add us if ya still interested doe
yeah for sure, we can have a go now if ur on?
